titleStmt.title: Dreadful news from Wapping: being a further relation of the sad and miserable condition of Sarah Bower a young girl, of about fourteen years of age, who is unhappily, at present, posses'd with an evil spirit, by Wapping New-Stairs, near the Chappel. All faithfully related by Richard Kirby, student in physick and astrology, who hath visited her. Licensed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Dirby, Richard, b. 1649.

notesStmt.note: Copy stained; title page trimmed at foot with partial loss of imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
